name: Replay The Spire
description: Huge content expansion mod. Adds new cards, relics, potions, events, monsters, and shenanigans.
credits: Original creator of Replay: AstroPenguin642. Artists: Bakuhaku, Stewartisme, Lyman, RedDyeNo5. OST: Slimer509. Spanish translation: PJJLegend. Also helped: Reina, Blank the Evil.
